title: Beautiful 2 bed apt, walk to Davis square, heat, hot water included
posting_body: ['NO BROKER FEE.', 'I have a beautiful 2 bedroom apartment for rent.', 'The apartment located in a very convenient location, Magoun Square.', 'It is around 17 minutes walk from Davis square, redline T, 3 minutes walk from Green line extension T station.', 'Banks, restaurants, markets, CVS, Dunkin’ Donuts, 7 eleven are in the corner.', 'Apartment features', 'First floor', 'Hardwood floor', 'Granite counter top', 'Gas heat', 'The rent is $2900/ month.', 'Heat & hot water are included.', 'So you don’t have to be worry about paying big bills every month during the very cold and long winter in the New England.', 'First month+last month+ $500 security deposit to move in.', 'If you are interested in the apartment, please contact 617 866 7458 for showing']
